input.content:
#!/bin/bash

# äºŒçº§åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡æ—¥å¿—åŒæ­¥è„šæœ¬
# åŠŸèƒ½ï¼šä»nginxæ—¥å¿—æå–ç›¸å…³åŸŸåè®¿é—®ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œæ¨é€åˆ°webclickç›®å½•
# æ‰§è¡Œé¢‘ç‡ï¼šæ¯å°æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡

LOG_DIR="/var/log/nginx"
TARGET_DIR="/mnt/www/webclick"
TIMESTAMP=$(date '+%Y%m%d_%H%M')

# ç¡®ä¿ç›®æ ‡ç›®å½•å­˜åœ¨
mkdir -p "$TARGET_DIR"

# å®šä¹‰éœ€è¦ç›‘æ§çš„åŸŸåï¼ˆä¸ä¸»é¡µ6ä¸ªå¡ç‰‡å¯¹åº”ï¼‰
declare -A DOMAINS
DOMAINS[app]="linapp.fun /app"           # ä¸»åŸŸå/appè·¯å¾„
DOMAINS[az]="az.linapp.fun"              # æ•°æ®åˆ†æ
DOMAINS[didi]="didi.linapp.fun"          # å®¢æˆ·ç®¡ç†  
DOMAINS[pdf]="pdf.linapp.fun"            # PDFå·¥å…·
DOMAINS[vote]="vote.linapp.fun"          # æŠ•ç¥¨ç³»ç»Ÿ
DOMAINS[meet]="meet.linapp.fun"          # ä¼šè®®å·¥å…·

# è·å–è¿‡å»24å°æ—¶çš„æ—¶é—´èŒƒå›´
CURRENT_HOUR=$(date '+%H')
CURRENT_DAY=$(date '+%d/%b/%Y')
YESTERDAY=$(date -d "1 day ago" '+%d/%b/%Y')

echo "å¼€å§‹åŒæ­¥åŸŸåè®¿é—®æ—¥å¿— - $(date)"

# å¤„ç†æ¯ä¸ªåŸŸå
for key in "${!DOMAINS[@]}"; do
    domain_info="${DOMAINS[$key]}"
    echo "å¤„ç†åŸŸå: $key ($domain_info)"
    
    output_file="$TARGET_DIR/${key}_${TIMESTAMP}.log"
    
    if [[ "$key" == "app" ]]; then
        # å¤„ç†ä¸»åŸŸåä¸‹çš„/appè·¯å¾„
        if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log" ]]; then
            # æå–è¿‡å»24å°æ—¶/appè·¯å¾„çš„è®¿é—®è®°å½•
            awk -v current_day="$CURRENT_DAY" -v yesterday="$YESTERDAY" '
            BEGIN { count = 0 }
            {
                # æå–æ—¶é—´æˆ³å’Œè·¯å¾„
                match($0, /\[([^\]]+)\]/, time_arr)
                match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
                
                if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/ && (index($0, current_day) > 0 || index($0, yesterday) > 0)) {
                    count++
                    print $0
                }
            }
            END { print "# æ€»è®¿é—®é‡:", count > "/dev/stderr" }
            ' "$LOG_DIR/access.log" > "$output_file" 2>"$TARGET_DIR/${key}_count_${TIMESTAMP}.txt"
        fi
    else
        # å¤„ç†äºŒçº§åŸŸå
        log_file="$LOG_DIR/${domain_info}.access.log"
        if [[ -f "$log_file" ]]; then
            # æå–è¿‡å»24å°æ—¶çš„è®¿é—®è®°å½•
            awk -v current_day="$CURRENT_DAY" -v yesterday="$YESTERDAY" '
            BEGIN { count = 0 }
            {
                if (index($0, current_day) > 0 || index($0, yesterday) > 0) {
                    count++
                    print $0
                }
            }
            END { print "# æ€»è®¿é—®é‡:", count > "/dev/stderr" }
            ' "$log_file" > "$output_file" 2>"$TARGET_DIR/${key}_count_${TIMESTAMP}.txt"
        else
            echo "æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ä¸å­˜åœ¨: $log_file" 
            echo "0" > "$TARGET_DIR/${key}_count_${TIMESTAMP}.txt"
        fi
    fi
    
    # è·å–æ–‡ä»¶è¡Œæ•°ä½œä¸ºè®¿é—®é‡
    if [[ -f "$output_file" ]]; then
        line_count=$(wc -l < "$output_file")
        echo "$line_count" > "$TARGET_DIR/${key}_count_${TIMESTAMP}.txt"
        echo "  - æå–äº† $line_count æ¡è®¿é—®è®°å½•"
    else

#!/bin/bash

# å…¨åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡ç»Ÿè®¡å’Œæ’è¡Œè„šæœ¬
# åŠŸèƒ½ï¼šåŠ¨æ€å‘ç°æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸåï¼Œç»Ÿè®¡24å°æ—¶è®¿é—®é‡ï¼Œç”Ÿæˆæ’è¡Œæ¦œ
# æ‰§è¡Œé¢‘ç‡ï¼šæ¯å°æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡

LOG_DIR="/var/log/nginx"
TARGET_DIR="/mnt/www/webclick"
TIMESTAMP=$(date '+%Y%m%d_%H%M')
CURRENT_HOUR=$(date '+%H')
CURRENT_DAY=$(date '+%d/%b/%Y')
YESTERDAY=$(date -d "1 day ago" '+%d/%b/%Y')

# ç¡®ä¿ç›®æ ‡ç›®å½•å­˜åœ¨
mkdir -p "$TARGET_DIR"

echo "å¼€å§‹å…¨åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡ç»Ÿè®¡ - $(date)"
echo "ç»Ÿè®¡æ—¶é—´èŒƒå›´: è¿‡å»24å°æ—¶"

# åŠ¨æ€å‘ç°æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸåæ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
declare -A domain_stats
domain_count=0

echo "å‘ç°çš„åŸŸåæ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š"

# 1. å¤„ç†ä¸»åŸŸå/appè·¯å¾„
if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log" ]]; then
    echo "  - ä¸»åŸŸå: linapp.fun/app"
    app_count=$(awk -v current_day="$CURRENT_DAY" -v yesterday="$YESTERDAY" '
    BEGIN { count = 0 }
    {
        match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
        if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/ && (index($0, current_day) > 0 || index($0, yesterday) > 0)) {
            count++
        }
    }
    END { print count }
    ' "$LOG_DIR/access.log")
    
    domain_stats["app|linapp.fun/app|ğŸ¤– AIå†…å®¹ç”Ÿæˆ"]="$app_count"
    ((domain_count++))
fi

# 2. å¤„ç†æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸå
for log_file in $(find "$LOG_DIR" -name "*.linapp.fun.access.log" 2>/dev/null | sort); do
    if [[ -f "$log_file" ]]; then
        domain_name=$(basename "$log_file" .access.log)
        echo "  - äºŒçº§åŸŸå: $domain_name"
        
        # ç»Ÿè®¡è¿‡å»24å°æ—¶è®¿é—®é‡
        visit_count=$(awk -v current_day="$CURRENT_DAY" -v yesterday="$YESTERDAY" '
        BEGIN { count = 0 }
        {
            if (index($0, current_day) > 0 || index($0, yesterday) > 0) {
                count++
            }
        }
        END { print count }
        ' "$log_file")
        
        # è®¾ç½®åŸŸåæ˜¾ç¤ºä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆæ ¹æ®ç°æœ‰ä¸»é¡µå†…å®¹ï¼‰
        case "$domain_name" in
            "az.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“Š æ•°æ®åˆ†æ" ;;
            "didi.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ‘¥ å®¢æˆ·ç®¡ç†" ;;
            "pdf.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“„ PDFå·¥å…·" ;;
            "vote.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ—³ï¸ æŠ•ç¥¨ç³»ç»Ÿ" ;;
            "meet.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“± ä¼šè®®å·¥å…·" ;;
            "6page.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“‹ å…­é¡µåº”ç”¨" ;;
            "dianbo.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“» ç‚¹æ’­ç³»ç»Ÿ" ;;
            *) display_name="ğŸ”§ ${domain_name%%.*}" ;;
        esac
        
        domain_stats["${domain_name%%.*}|$domain_name|$display_name"]="$visit_count"
        ((domain_count++))
    fi
done

echo ""
echo "ç»Ÿè®¡å®Œæˆï¼Œå…±å‘ç° $domain_count ä¸ªåŸŸå"
echo ""

# æŒ‰è®¿é—®é‡æ’åº
echo "æŒ‰è®¿é—®é‡æ’è¡Œï¼š"
echo "æ’å | åŸŸå | 24å°æ—¶è®¿é—®é‡"
echo "----|------|-------------"

# åˆ›å»ºä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶è¿›è¡Œæ’åº
temp_file="/tmp/domain_ranking_$$.txt"
> "$temp_file"

for key in "${!domain_stats[@]}"; do
    count="${domain_stats[$key]}"
    echo "$count|$key" >> "$temp_file"
done

# æŒ‰è®¿é—®é‡é™åºæ’åº
sort -t'|' -k1,1nr "$temp_file" > "${temp_file}_sorted"

# ç”Ÿæˆæ’è¡Œæ¦œå’ŒJSONæ–‡ä»¶
ranking_file="$TARGET_DIR/ranking_${TIMESTAMP}.json"
echo "{" > "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"timestamp\": \"$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)\"," >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"period\": \"24h\"," >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"total_domains\": $domain_count," >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"ranking\": [" >> "$ranking_file"

rank=1
first=true

while IFS='|' read -r count short_name full_domain display_name; do
    printf "%2d   | %-20s | %8s\n" "$rank" "$display_name" "$count"
    
    # æ·»åŠ åˆ°JSON
    if [[ "$first" == "true" ]]; then
        first=false
    else
        echo "    ," >> "$ranking_file"
    fi
    
    echo "    {" >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"rank\": $rank," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"short_name\": \"$short_name\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"domain\": \"$full_domain\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"display_name\": \"$display_name\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"visits_24h\": $count" >> "$ranking_file"
    echo -n "    }" >> "$ranking_file"
    
    ((rank++))
done < "${temp_file}_sorted"

echo "" >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  ]" >> "$ranking_file"
echo "}" >> "$ranking_file"

echo ""
echo "æ’è¡Œæ¦œå·²ä¿å­˜åˆ°: $ranking_file"

# ç”Ÿæˆä¸“é—¨çš„Top6æ–‡ä»¶ä¾›ä¸»é¡µä½¿ç”¨
top6_file="$TARGET_DIR/top6_${TIMESTAMP}.json"
echo "{" > "$top6_file"
echo "  \"timestamp\": \"$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)\"," >> "$top6_file"
echo "  \"last_update\": \"$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')\"," >> "$top6_file"
echo "  \"period\": \"24h\"," >> "$top6_file"
echo "  \"top6\": [" >> "$top6_file"

rank=1
first=true

while IFS='|' read -r count short_name full_domain display_name && [[ $rank -le 6 ]]; do
    if [[ "$first" == "true" ]]; then
        first=false
    else
        echo "    ," >> "$top6_file"
    fi
    
    echo "    {" >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"rank\": $rank," >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"short_name\": \"$short_name\"," >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"domain\": \"$full_domain\"," >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"display_name\": \"$display_name\"," >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"visits_24h\": $count," >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"url\": \"$(if [[ $full_domain == *"/app"* ]]; then echo "/app"; else echo "https://$full_domain"; fi)\"" >> "$top6_file"
    echo -n "    }" >> "$top6_file"
    
    ((rank++))
done < "${temp_file}_sorted"

echo "" >> "$top6_file"
echo "  ]" >> "$top6_file"
echo "}" >> "$top6_file"

echo "Top6æ–‡ä»¶å·²ä¿å­˜åˆ°: $top6_file"

# åˆ›å»ºlatesté“¾æ¥æŒ‡å‘æœ€æ–°æ–‡ä»¶
ln -sf "ranking_${TIMESTAMP}.json" "$TARGET_DIR/latest_ranking.json"
ln -sf "top6_${TIMESTAMP}.json" "$TARGET_DIR/latest_top6.json"

# æ¸…ç†ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
rm -f "$temp_file" "${temp_file}_sorted"

# æ¸…ç†7å¤©å‰çš„æ—§æ–‡ä»¶
find "$TARGET_DIR" -name "ranking_*.json" -mtime +7 -delete 2>/dev/null
find "$TARGET_DIR" -name "top6_*.json" -mtime +7 -delete 2>/dev/null

echo ""
echo "ç»Ÿè®¡å®Œæˆ - $(date)"
echo "æœ€æ–°æ•°æ®: latest_ranking.json, latest_top6.json"
echo "---"

#!/bin/bash

# å…¨åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡ç»Ÿè®¡å’Œæ’è¡Œè„šæœ¬
# åŠŸèƒ½ï¼šåŠ¨æ€å‘ç°æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸåï¼Œç»Ÿè®¡è¿‡å»7å¤©è®¿é—®é‡ï¼Œç”Ÿæˆæ’è¡Œæ¦œ
# æ‰§è¡Œé¢‘ç‡ï¼šæ¯å°æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡

LOG_DIR="/var/log/nginx"
TARGET_DIR="/mnt/www/webclick"
TIMESTAMP=$(date '+%Y%m%d_%H%M')
CURRENT_HOUR=$(date '+%H')

# ç”Ÿæˆè¿‡å»7å¤©çš„æ—¥æœŸæ¨¡å¼
declare -a DATE_PATTERNS
for i in {0..6}; do
    day_pattern=$(date -d "$i days ago" '+%d/%b/%Y')
    DATE_PATTERNS+=("$day_pattern")
done

# ç¡®ä¿ç›®æ ‡ç›®å½•å­˜åœ¨
mkdir -p "$TARGET_DIR"

# åˆ›å»ºç»Ÿè®¡æ—¥æœŸèŒƒå›´çš„AWKæ¨¡å¼
DATE_PATTERN_AWK=""
for pattern in "${DATE_PATTERNS[@]}"; do
    if [[ -n "$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" ]]; then
        DATE_PATTERN_AWK="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK|"
    fi
    DATE_PATTERN_AWK="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK$pattern"
done

echo "å¼€å§‹å…¨åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡ç»Ÿè®¡ - $(date)"
echo "ç»Ÿè®¡æ—¶é—´èŒƒå›´: è¿‡å»7å¤©"
echo "æ—¥æœŸèŒƒå›´: ${DATE_PATTERNS[6]} è‡³ ${DATE_PATTERNS[0]}"

# ç»Ÿè®¡ä¸»åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡çš„å‡½æ•°
count_main_domain_visits() {
    local log_pattern="$1"
    local total_count=0
    
    # å¤„ç†å½“å‰æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log" ]]; then
        count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
        BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
        {
            match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
            if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                for (i in date_arr) {
                    if (index($0, date_arr[i]) > 0) {
                        count++
                        break
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        END { print count }
        ' "$LOG_DIR/access.log")
        total_count=$((total_count + count))
    fi
    
    # å¤„ç†è½®è½¬çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆ.1, .2, .3ç­‰ï¼‰
    for i in {1..7}; do
        if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i" ]]; then
            count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
                if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                    for (j in date_arr) {
                        if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                            count++
                            break
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }
            ' "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i")
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
        
        # å¤„ç†å‹ç¼©çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
        if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i.gz" ]]; then
            count=$(zcat "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i.gz" | awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
                if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                    for (j in date_arr) {
                        if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                            count++
                            break
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }')
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
    done
    
    echo $total_count
}

# ç»Ÿè®¡äºŒçº§åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡çš„å‡½æ•°  
count_subdomain_visits() {
    local domain_name="$1"
    local total_count=0
    
    # å¤„ç†å½“å‰æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    log_file="$LOG_DIR/${domain_name}.access.log"
    if [[ -f "$log_file" ]]; then
        count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
        BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
        {
            for (i in date_arr) {
                if (index($0, date_arr[i]) > 0) {
                    count++
                    break
                }
            }
        }
        END { print count }
        ' "$log_file")
        total_count=$((total_count + count))
    fi
    
    # å¤„ç†è½®è½¬çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    for i in {1..7}; do
        if [[ -f "${log_file}.$i" ]]; then
            count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                for (j in date_arr) {
                    if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                        count++
                        break
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }
            ' "${log_file}.$i")
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
        
        # å¤„ç†å‹ç¼©çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
        if [[ -f "${log_file}.$i.gz" ]]; then
            count=$(zcat "${log_file}.$i.gz" | awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                for (j in date_arr) {
                    if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                        count++
                        break
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }')
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
    done
    
    echo $total_count
}

# åŠ¨æ€å‘ç°æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸåæ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶

domain_count=0

echo "å‘ç°çš„åŸŸåæ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š"

# 1. å¤„ç†ä¸»åŸŸå/appè·¯å¾„

for log_file in $(find "$LOG_DIR" -name "*.linapp.fun.access.log" 2>/dev/null | sort); do

        visit_count=$(count_subdomain_visits "$domain_name")

        case "$domain_name" in
            "az.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“Š æ•°æ®åˆ†æ" ;;
            "didi.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ‘¥ å®¢æˆ·ç®¡ç†" ;;
            "pdf.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“„ PDFå·¥å…·" ;;
            "vote.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ—³ï¸ æŠ•ç¥¨ç³»ç»Ÿ" ;;
            "meet.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“± ä¼šè®®å·¥å…·" ;;
            "6page.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“‹ å…­é¡µåº”ç”¨" ;;
            "dianbo.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“» ç‚¹æ’­ç³»ç»Ÿ" ;;
            *) display_name="ğŸ”§ ${domain_name%%.*}" ;;
        esac
        
        domain_stats["${domain_name%%.*}|$domain_name|$display_name"]="$visit_count"
        ((domain_count++))
    fi
done

echo ""

echo ""

> "$temp_file"

# æŒ‰è®¿é—®é‡é™åºæ’åº
sort -t'|' -k1,1nr "$temp_file" > "${temp_file}_sorted"

# ç”Ÿæˆæ’è¡Œæ¦œå’ŒJSONæ–‡ä»¶
ranking_file="$TARGET_DIR/ranking_${TIMESTAMP}.json"
echo "{" > "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"timestamp\": \"$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)\"," >> "$ranking_file"

echo "  \"ranking\": [" >> "$ranking_file"

rank=1

while IFS='|' read -r count short_name full_domain display_name; do
    printf "%2d   | %-20s | %8s\n" "$rank" "$display_name" "$count"
    
    # æ·»åŠ åˆ°JSON
    if [[ "$first" == "true" ]]; then
        first=false

        echo "    ," >> "$ranking_file"
    fi
    
    echo "    {" >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"rank\": $rank," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"short_name\": \"$short_name\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"domain\": \"$full_domain\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"display_name\": \"$display_name\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"visits_24h\": $count" >> "$ranking_file"
    echo -n "    }" >> "$ranking_file"
    
    ((rank++))
done < "${temp_file}_sorted"

echo "" >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  ]" >> "$ranking_file"
echo "}" >> "$ranking_file"

echo ""

# ç”Ÿæˆä¸“é—¨çš„Top6æ–‡ä»¶ä¾›ä¸»é¡µä½¿ç”¨

# å…¨åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡ç»Ÿè®¡å’Œæ’è¡Œè„šæœ¬
# åŠŸèƒ½ï¼šåŠ¨æ€å‘ç°æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸåï¼Œç»Ÿè®¡è¿‡å»7å¤©è®¿é—®é‡ï¼Œç”Ÿæˆæ’è¡Œæ¦œ
# æ‰§è¡Œé¢‘ç‡ï¼šæ¯å°æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡

LOG_DIR="/var/log/nginx"
TARGET_DIR="/mnt/www/webclick"

#!/bin/bash

# å…¨åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡ç»Ÿè®¡å’Œæ’è¡Œè„šæœ¬
# åŠŸèƒ½ï¼šåŠ¨æ€å‘ç°æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸåï¼Œç»Ÿè®¡è¿‡å»7å¤©è®¿é—®é‡ï¼Œç”Ÿæˆæ’è¡Œæ¦œ
# æ‰§è¡Œé¢‘ç‡ï¼šæ¯å°æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡

LOG_DIR="/var/log/nginx"
TARGET_DIR="/mnt/www/webclick"
TIMESTAMP=$(date '+%Y%m%d_%H%M')
CURRENT_HOUR=$(date '+%H')

# ç”Ÿæˆè¿‡å»7å¤©çš„æ—¥æœŸæ¨¡å¼
declare -a DATE_PATTERNS
for i in {0..6}; do
    day_pattern=$(date -d "$i days ago" '+%d/%b/%Y')
    DATE_PATTERNS+=("$day_pattern")
done

# ç¡®ä¿ç›®æ ‡ç›®å½•å­˜åœ¨
mkdir -p "$TARGET_DIR"

# åˆ›å»ºç»Ÿè®¡æ—¥æœŸèŒƒå›´çš„AWKæ¨¡å¼
DATE_PATTERN_AWK=""
for pattern in "${DATE_PATTERNS[@]}"; do
    if [[ -n "$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" ]]; then
        DATE_PATTERN_AWK="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK|"
    fi
    DATE_PATTERN_AWK="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK$pattern"
done

echo "å¼€å§‹å…¨åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡ç»Ÿè®¡ - $(date)"
echo "ç»Ÿè®¡æ—¶é—´èŒƒå›´: è¿‡å»7å¤©"
echo "æ—¥æœŸèŒƒå›´: ${DATE_PATTERNS[6]} è‡³ ${DATE_PATTERNS[0]}"

# ç»Ÿè®¡ä¸»åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡çš„å‡½æ•°
count_main_domain_visits() {
    local log_pattern="$1"
    local total_count=0
    
    # å¤„ç†å½“å‰æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log" ]]; then
        count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
        BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
        {
            match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
            if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                for (i in date_arr) {
                    if (index($0, date_arr[i]) > 0) {
                        count++
                        break
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        END { print count }
        ' "$LOG_DIR/access.log")
        total_count=$((total_count + count))
    fi
    
    # å¤„ç†è½®è½¬çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆ.1, .2, .3ç­‰ï¼‰
    for i in {1..7}; do
        if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i" ]]; then
            count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
                if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                    for (j in date_arr) {
                        if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                            count++
                            break
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }
            ' "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i")
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
        
        # å¤„ç†å‹ç¼©çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
        if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i.gz" ]]; then
            count=$(zcat "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i.gz" | awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
                if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                    for (j in date_arr) {
                        if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                            count++
                            break
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }')
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
    done
    
    echo $total_count
}

# ç»Ÿè®¡äºŒçº§åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡çš„å‡½æ•°  
count_subdomain_visits() {
    local domain_name="$1"

    # å¤„ç†è½®è½¬çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    for i in {1..7}; do

            count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '

                        break
                    }
                }
            }

            total_count=$((total_count + count))

        # å¤„ç†å‹ç¼©çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
        if [[ -f "${log_file}.$i.gz" ]]; then

            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }

                        break
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }')
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
    done
    
    echo $total_count
}

#!/bin/bash

# å…¨åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡ç»Ÿè®¡å’Œæ’è¡Œè„šæœ¬
# åŠŸèƒ½ï¼šåŠ¨æ€å‘ç°æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸåï¼Œç»Ÿè®¡è¿‡å»7å¤©è®¿é—®é‡ï¼Œç”Ÿæˆæ’è¡Œæ¦œ
# æ‰§è¡Œé¢‘ç‡ï¼šæ¯å°æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡

LOG_DIR="/var/log/nginx"
TARGET_DIR="/mnt/www/webclick"
TIMESTAMP=$(date '+%Y%m%d_%H%M')
CURRENT_HOUR=$(date '+%H')

# ç”Ÿæˆè¿‡å»7å¤©çš„æ—¥æœŸæ¨¡å¼
declare -a DATE_PATTERNS
for i in {0..6}; do
    day_pattern=$(date -d "$i days ago" '+%d/%b/%Y')
    DATE_PATTERNS+=("$day_pattern")
done

# ç¡®ä¿ç›®æ ‡ç›®å½•å­˜åœ¨
mkdir -p "$TARGET_DIR"

# åˆ›å»ºç»Ÿè®¡æ—¥æœŸèŒƒå›´çš„AWKæ¨¡å¼
DATE_PATTERN_AWK=""
for pattern in "${DATE_PATTERNS[@]}"; do
    if [[ -n "$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" ]]; then
        DATE_PATTERN_AWK="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK|"
    fi
    DATE_PATTERN_AWK="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK$pattern"
done

echo "å¼€å§‹å…¨åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡ç»Ÿè®¡ - $(date)"
echo "ç»Ÿè®¡æ—¶é—´èŒƒå›´: è¿‡å»7å¤©"
echo "æ—¥æœŸèŒƒå›´: ${DATE_PATTERNS[6]} è‡³ ${DATE_PATTERNS[0]}"

# ç»Ÿè®¡ä¸»åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡çš„å‡½æ•°
count_main_domain_visits() {
    local log_pattern="$1"
    local total_count=0
    
    # å¤„ç†å½“å‰æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log" ]]; then
        count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
        BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
        {
            match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
            if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                for (i in date_arr) {
                    if (index($0, date_arr[i]) > 0) {
                        count++
                        break
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        END { print count }
        ' "$LOG_DIR/access.log")
        total_count=$((total_count + count))
    fi
    
    # å¤„ç†è½®è½¬çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆ.1, .2, .3ç­‰ï¼‰
    for i in {1..7}; do
        if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i" ]]; then
            count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
                if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                    for (j in date_arr) {
                        if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                            count++
                            break
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }
            ' "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i")
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
        
        # å¤„ç†å‹ç¼©çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
        if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i.gz" ]]; then
            count=$(zcat "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i.gz" | awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
                if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                    for (j in date_arr) {
                        if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                            count++
                            break
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }')
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
    done
    
    echo $total_count
}

# ç»Ÿè®¡äºŒçº§åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡çš„å‡½æ•°  
count_subdomain_visits() {
    local domain_name="$1"
    local total_count=0
    
    # å¤„ç†å½“å‰æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    log_file="$LOG_DIR/${domain_name}.access.log"
    if [[ -f "$log_file" ]]; then
        count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
        BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
        {
            for (i in date_arr) {
                if (index($0, date_arr[i]) > 0) {
                    count++
                    break
                }
            }
        }
        END { print count }
        ' "$log_file")
        total_count=$((total_count + count))
    fi
    
    # å¤„ç†è½®è½¬çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    for i in {1..7}; do
        if [[ -f "${log_file}.$i" ]]; then
            count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                for (j in date_arr) {
                    if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                        count++
                        break
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }
            ' "${log_file}.$i")
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
        
        # å¤„ç†å‹ç¼©çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
        if [[ -f "${log_file}.$i.gz" ]]; then
            count=$(zcat "${log_file}.$i.gz" | awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                for (j in date_arr) {
                    if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                        count++
                        break
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }')
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
    done
    
    echo $total_count
}

# åŠ¨æ€å‘ç°æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸåæ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
declare -A domain_stats
domain_count=0

echo "å‘ç°çš„åŸŸåæ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š"

# 1. å¤„ç†ä¸»åŸŸå/appè·¯å¾„
echo "  - ä¸»åŸŸå: linapp.fun/app"
app_count=$(count_main_domain_visits)
domain_stats["app|linapp.fun/app|ğŸ¤– AIå†…å®¹ç”Ÿæˆ"]="$app_count"
((domain_count++))

# 2. å¤„ç†æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸå
for log_file in $(find "$LOG_DIR" -name "*.linapp.fun.access.log" 2>/dev/null | sort); do
    if [[ -f "$log_file" ]]; then
        domain_name=$(basename "$log_file" .access.log)
        echo "  - äºŒçº§åŸŸå: $domain_name"
        
        # ç»Ÿè®¡è¿‡å»7å¤©è®¿é—®é‡
        visit_count=$(count_subdomain_visits "$domain_name")
        
        # è®¾ç½®åŸŸåæ˜¾ç¤ºä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆæ ¹æ®ç°æœ‰ä¸»é¡µå†…å®¹ï¼‰
        case "$domain_name" in
            "az.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“Š æ•°æ®åˆ†æ" ;;
            "didi.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ‘¥ å®¢æˆ·ç®¡ç†" ;;
            "pdf.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“„ PDFå·¥å…·" ;;
            "vote.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ—³ï¸ æŠ•ç¥¨ç³»ç»Ÿ" ;;
            "meet.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“± ä¼šè®®å·¥å…·" ;;
            "6page.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“‹ å…­é¡µåº”ç”¨" ;;
            "dianbo.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“» ç‚¹æ’­ç³»ç»Ÿ" ;;
            *) display_name="ğŸ”§ ${domain_name%%.*}" ;;
        esac
        
        domain_stats["${domain_name%%.*}|$domain_name|$display_name"]="$visit_count"
        ((domain_count++))
    fi
done

echo ""
echo "ç»Ÿè®¡å®Œæˆï¼Œå…±å‘ç° $domain_count ä¸ªåŸŸå"
echo ""

# æŒ‰è®¿é—®é‡æ’åº
echo "æŒ‰è®¿é—®é‡æ’è¡Œï¼š"
echo "æ’å | åŸŸå | 7å¤©è®¿é—®é‡"
echo "----|------|----------"

# åˆ›å»ºä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶è¿›è¡Œæ’åº
temp_file="/tmp/domain_ranking_$$.txt"
> "$temp_file"

for key in "${!domain_stats[@]}"; do
    count="${domain_stats[$key]}"
    echo "$count|$key" >> "$temp_file"
done

# æŒ‰è®¿é—®é‡é™åºæ’åº
sort -t'|' -k1,1nr "$temp_file" > "${temp_file}_sorted"

# ç”Ÿæˆæ’è¡Œæ¦œå’ŒJSONæ–‡ä»¶
ranking_file="$TARGET_DIR/ranking_${TIMESTAMP}.json"
echo "{" > "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"timestamp\": \"$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)\"," >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"period\": \"7d\"," >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"total_domains\": $domain_count," >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"ranking\": [" >> "$ranking_file"

rank=1
first=true

while IFS='|' read -r count short_name full_domain display_name; do
    printf "%2d   | %-20s | %8s\n" "$rank" "$display_name" "$count"
    
    # æ·»åŠ åˆ°JSON
    if [[ "$first" == "true" ]]; then
        first=false
    else
        echo "    ," >> "$ranking_file"
    fi
    
    echo "    {" >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"rank\": $rank," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"short_name\": \"$short_name\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"domain\": \"$full_domain\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"display_name\": \"$display_name\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"visits_7d\": $count" >> "$ranking_file"
    echo -n "    }" >> "$ranking_file"
    
    ((rank++))
done < "${temp_file}_sorted"

echo "" >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  ]" >> "$ranking_file"
echo "}" >> "$ranking_file"

echo ""
echo "æ’è¡Œæ¦œå·²ä¿å­˜åˆ°: $ranking_file"

# ç”Ÿæˆä¸“é—¨çš„Top6æ–‡ä»¶ä¾›ä¸»é¡µä½¿ç”¨
top6_file="$TARGET_DIR/top6_${TIMESTAMP}.json"
echo "{" > "$top6_file"
echo "  \"timestamp\": \"$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)\"," >> "$top6_file"
echo "  \"last_update\": \"$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')\"," >> "$top6_file"
echo "  \"period\": \"7d\"," >> "$top6_file"
echo "  \"top6\": [" >> "$top6_file"

rank=1
first=true

while IFS='|' read -r count short_name full_domain display_name && [[ $rank -le 6 ]]; do
    if [[ "$first" == "true" ]]; then
        first=false
    else
        echo "    ," >> "$top6_file"
    fi
    
    echo "    {" >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"rank\": $rank," >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"short_name\": \"$short_name\"," >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"domain\": \"$full_domain\"," >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"display_name\": \"$display_name\"," >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"visits_24h\": $count," >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"url\": \"$(if [[ $full_domain == *"/app"* ]]; then echo "/app"; else echo "https://$full_domain"; fi)\"" >> "$top6_file"
    echo -n "    }" >> "$top6_file"
    
    ((rank++))
done < "${temp_file}_sorted"

echo "" >> "$top6_file"
echo "  ]" >> "$top6_file"
echo "}" >> "$top6_file"

echo "Top6æ–‡ä»¶å·²ä¿å­˜åˆ°: $top6_file"

# åˆ›å»ºlatesté“¾æ¥æŒ‡å‘æœ€æ–°æ–‡ä»¶
ln -sf "ranking_${TIMESTAMP}.json" "$TARGET_DIR/latest_ranking.json"
ln -sf "top6_${TIMESTAMP}.json" "$TARGET_DIR/latest_top6.json"

# æ¸…ç†ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
rm -f "$temp_file" "${temp_file}_sorted"

# æ¸…ç†7å¤©å‰çš„æ—§æ–‡ä»¶
find "$TARGET_DIR" -name "ranking_*.json" -mtime +7 -delete 2>/dev/null
find "$TARGET_DIR" -name "top6_*.json" -mtime +7 -delete 2>/dev/null

echo ""
echo "ç»Ÿè®¡å®Œæˆ - $(date)"
echo "æœ€æ–°æ•°æ®: latest_ranking.json, latest_top6.json"
echo "---"

#!/bin/bash

# å…¨åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡ç»Ÿè®¡å’Œæ’è¡Œè„šæœ¬
# åŠŸèƒ½ï¼šåŠ¨æ€å‘ç°æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸåï¼Œç»Ÿè®¡è¿‡å»7å¤©è®¿é—®é‡ï¼Œç”Ÿæˆæ’è¡Œæ¦œ
# æ‰§è¡Œé¢‘ç‡ï¼šæ¯å°æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡

LOG_DIR="/var/log/nginx"
TARGET_DIR="/mnt/www/webclick"
TIMESTAMP=$(date '+%Y%m%d_%H%M')
CURRENT_HOUR=$(date '+%H')

# ç”Ÿæˆè¿‡å»7å¤©çš„æ—¥æœŸæ¨¡å¼
declare -a DATE_PATTERNS
for i in {0..6}; do
    day_pattern=$(date -d "$i days ago" '+%d/%b/%Y')
    DATE_PATTERNS+=("$day_pattern")
done

# ç¡®ä¿ç›®æ ‡ç›®å½•å­˜åœ¨
mkdir -p "$TARGET_DIR"

# åˆ›å»ºç»Ÿè®¡æ—¥æœŸèŒƒå›´çš„AWKæ¨¡å¼
DATE_PATTERN_AWK=""
for pattern in "${DATE_PATTERNS[@]}"; do
    if [[ -n "$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" ]]; then
        DATE_PATTERN_AWK="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK|"
    fi
    DATE_PATTERN_AWK="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK$pattern"
done

echo "å¼€å§‹å…¨åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡ç»Ÿè®¡ - $(date)"
echo "ç»Ÿè®¡æ—¶é—´èŒƒå›´: è¿‡å»7å¤©"
echo "æ—¥æœŸèŒƒå›´: ${DATE_PATTERNS[6]} è‡³ ${DATE_PATTERNS[0]}"

# ç»Ÿè®¡ä¸»åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡çš„å‡½æ•°
count_main_domain_visits() {
    local log_pattern="$1"
    local total_count=0
    
    # å¤„ç†å½“å‰æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log" ]]; then
        count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
        BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
        {
            match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
            if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                for (i in date_arr) {
                    if (index($0, date_arr[i]) > 0) {
                        count++
                        break
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        END { print count }
        ' "$LOG_DIR/access.log")
        total_count=$((total_count + count))
    fi
    
    # å¤„ç†è½®è½¬çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆ.1, .2, .3ç­‰ï¼‰
    for i in {1..7}; do
        if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i" ]]; then
            count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
                if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                    for (j in date_arr) {
                        if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                            count++
                            break
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }
            ' "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i")
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
        
        # å¤„ç†å‹ç¼©çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
        if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i.gz" ]]; then
            count=$(zcat "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i.gz" | awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
                if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                    for (j in date_arr) {
                        if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                            count++
                            break
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }')
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
    done
    
    echo $total_count
}

# ç»Ÿè®¡äºŒçº§åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡çš„å‡½æ•°  
count_subdomain_visits() {
    local domain_name="$1"
    local total_count=0
    
    # å¤„ç†å½“å‰æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    log_file="$LOG_DIR/${domain_name}.access.log"
    if [[ -f "$log_file" ]]; then
        count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
        BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
        {
            for (i in date_arr) {
                if (index($0, date_arr[i]) > 0) {
                    count++
                    break
                }
            }
        }
        END { print count }
        ' "$log_file")
        total_count=$((total_count + count))
    fi
    
    # å¤„ç†è½®è½¬çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    for i in {1..7}; do
        if [[ -f "${log_file}.$i" ]]; then
            count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                for (j in date_arr) {
                    if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                        count++
                        break
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }
            ' "${log_file}.$i")
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
        
        # å¤„ç†å‹ç¼©çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
        if [[ -f "${log_file}.$i.gz" ]]; then
            count=$(zcat "${log_file}.$i.gz" | awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                for (j in date_arr) {
                    if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                        count++
                        break
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }')
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
    done
    
    echo $total_count
}

# åŠ¨æ€å‘ç°æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸåæ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
declare -A domain_stats
domain_count=0

echo "å‘ç°çš„åŸŸåæ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š"

# 1. å¤„ç†ä¸»åŸŸå/appè·¯å¾„
echo "  - ä¸»åŸŸå: linapp.fun/app"
app_count=$(count_main_domain_visits)
domain_stats["app|linapp.fun/app|ğŸ¤– AIå†…å®¹ç”Ÿæˆ"]="$app_count"
((domain_count++))

# 2. å¤„ç†æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸå
for log_file in $(find "$LOG_DIR" -name "*.linapp.fun.access.log" 2>/dev/null | sort); do
    if [[ -f "$log_file" ]]; then
        domain_name=$(basename "$log_file" .access.log)
        echo "  - äºŒçº§åŸŸå: $domain_name"
        
        # ç»Ÿè®¡è¿‡å»7å¤©è®¿é—®é‡
        visit_count=$(count_subdomain_visits "$domain_name")
        
        # è®¾ç½®åŸŸåæ˜¾ç¤ºä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆæ ¹æ®ç°æœ‰ä¸»é¡µå†…å®¹ï¼‰
        case "$domain_name" in
            "az.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“Š æ•°æ®åˆ†æ" ;;
            "didi.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ‘¥ å®¢æˆ·ç®¡ç†" ;;
            "pdf.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“„ PDFå·¥å…·" ;;
            "vote.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ—³ï¸ æŠ•ç¥¨ç³»ç»Ÿ" ;;
            "meet.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“± ä¼šè®®å·¥å…·" ;;
            "6page.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“‹ å…­é¡µåº”ç”¨" ;;
            "dianbo.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“» ç‚¹æ’­ç³»ç»Ÿ" ;;
            *) display_name="ğŸ”§ ${domain_name%%.*}" ;;
        esac
        
        domain_stats["${domain_name%%.*}|$domain_name|$display_name"]="$visit_count"
        ((domain_count++))
    fi
done

echo ""
echo "ç»Ÿè®¡å®Œæˆï¼Œå…±å‘ç° $domain_count ä¸ªåŸŸå"
echo ""

# æŒ‰è®¿é—®é‡æ’åº
echo "æŒ‰è®¿é—®é‡æ’è¡Œï¼š"
echo "æ’å | åŸŸå | 7å¤©è®¿é—®é‡"
echo "----|------|----------"

# åˆ›å»ºä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶è¿›è¡Œæ’åº
temp_file="/tmp/domain_ranking_$$.txt"
> "$temp_file"

for key in "${!domain_stats[@]}"; do
    count="${domain_stats[$key]}"
    echo "$count|$key" >> "$temp_file"
done

# æŒ‰è®¿é—®é‡é™åºæ’åº
sort -t'|' -k1,1nr "$temp_file" > "${temp_file}_sorted"

# ç”Ÿæˆæ’è¡Œæ¦œå’ŒJSONæ–‡ä»¶
ranking_file="$TARGET_DIR/ranking_${TIMESTAMP}.json"
echo "{" > "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"timestamp\": \"$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)\"," >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"period\": \"7d\"," >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"total_domains\": $domain_count," >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"ranking\": [" >> "$ranking_file"

rank=1
first=true

while IFS='|' read -r count short_name full_domain display_name; do
    printf "%2d   | %-20s | %8s\n" "$rank" "$display_name" "$count"
    
    # æ·»åŠ åˆ°JSON
    if [[ "$first" == "true" ]]; then
        first=false
    else
        echo "    ," >> "$ranking_file"
    fi
    
    echo "    {" >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"rank\": $rank," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"short_name\": \"$short_name\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"domain\": \"$full_domain\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"display_name\": \"$display_name\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"visits_7d\": $count" >> "$ranking_file"
    echo -n "    }" >> "$ranking_file"
    
    ((rank++))
done < "${temp_file}_sorted"

echo "" >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  ]" >> "$ranking_file"
echo "}" >> "$ranking_file"

echo ""
echo "æ’è¡Œæ¦œå·²ä¿å­˜åˆ°: $ranking_file"

# ç”Ÿæˆä¸“é—¨çš„Top6æ–‡ä»¶ä¾›ä¸»é¡µä½¿ç”¨
top6_file="$TARGET_DIR/top6_${TIMESTAMP}.json"
echo "{" > "$top6_file"
echo "  \"timestamp\": \"$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)\"," >> "$top6_file"
echo "  \"last_update\": \"$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')\"," >> "$top6_file"
echo "  \"period\": \"7d\"," >> "$top6_file"
echo "  \"top6\": [" >> "$top6_file"

rank=1
first=true

while IFS='|' read -r count short_name full_domain display_name && [[ $rank -le 6 ]]; do
    if [[ "$first" == "true" ]]; then
        first=false
    else
        echo "    ," >> "$top6_file"
    fi
    
    echo "    {" >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"rank\": $rank," >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"short_name\": \"$short_name\"," >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"domain\": \"$full_domain\"," >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"display_name\": \"$display_name\"," >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"visits_7d\": $count," >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"url\": \"$(if [[ $full_domain == *"/app"* ]]; then echo "/app"; else echo "https://$full_domain"; fi)\"" >> "$top6_file"
    echo -n "    }" >> "$top6_file"
    
    ((rank++))
done < "${temp_file}_sorted"

echo "" >> "$top6_file"
echo "  ]" >> "$top6_file"
echo "}" >> "$top6_file"

echo "Top6æ–‡ä»¶å·²ä¿å­˜åˆ°: $top6_file"

# åˆ›å»ºlatesté“¾æ¥æŒ‡å‘æœ€æ–°æ–‡ä»¶
ln -sf "ranking_${TIMESTAMP}.json" "$TARGET_DIR/latest_ranking.json"
ln -sf "top6_${TIMESTAMP}.json" "$TARGET_DIR/latest_top6.json"

# æ¸…ç†ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
rm -f "$temp_file" "${temp_file}_sorted"

# æ¸…ç†7å¤©å‰çš„æ—§æ–‡ä»¶
find "$TARGET_DIR" -name "ranking_*.json" -mtime +7 -delete 2>/dev/null
find "$TARGET_DIR" -name "top6_*.json" -mtime +7 -delete 2>/dev/null

echo ""
echo "ç»Ÿè®¡å®Œæˆ - $(date)"
echo "æœ€æ–°æ•°æ®: latest_ranking.json, latest_top6.json"
echo "---"

é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„ WEBCLICK_DIR = "/mnt/www/webclick" INDEX_FILE = "/mnt/www/index.html" BACKUP_DIR = "/home/main/site/backup" # é¡¹ç›®æè¿°æ˜ å°„ PROJECT_DESCRIPTIONS = { 'app': "æ™ºèƒ½PRã€FAQã€æ–‡æ¡£ç”Ÿæˆå·¥å…·ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå¤šç§å†…å®¹åˆ›ä½œéœ€æ±‚", 'az': "åœ°å›¾ç»Ÿè®¡ã€åŒºåŸŸåˆ†æã€æ•°æ®å¯è§†åŒ–å·¥å…·", 'didi': "å®¢æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯ç®¡ç†ã€æ•°æ®å¤„ç†ã€ä¸šåŠ¡åˆ†æç³»ç»Ÿ", 'pdf': "PDFæ–‡æ¡£å¤„ç†ã€è½¬æ¢ã€ç¼–è¾‘å·¥å…·", 'vote': "åœ¨çº¿æŠ•ç¥¨ã€é—®å·è°ƒæŸ¥ã€æ•°æ®æ”¶é›†å¹³å°", 'meet': "åœ¨çº¿ä¼šè®®ã€åä½œå·¥å…·ã€å›¢é˜Ÿæ²Ÿé€šå¹³å°", '6page': "å¿«é€Ÿç½‘é¡µç”Ÿæˆã€æ¨¡æ¿è®¾è®¡ã€å†…å®¹å‘å¸ƒå·¥å…·", 'dianbo': "åœ¨çº¿ç‚¹æ’­ã€åª’ä½“æ’­æ”¾ã€å†…å®¹åˆ†å‘å¹³å°" } # å¡ç‰‡é¢œè‰²ä¸»é¢˜ï¼ˆå¾ªç¯ä½¿ç”¨ï¼‰ CARD_COLORS = [ "linear-gradient(45deg, #4CAF50, #45a049)", # ç»¿è‰² "linear-gradient(45deg, #2196F3, #1976D2)", # è“è‰² "linear-gradient(45deg, #FF9800, #F57C00)", # æ©™è‰² "linear-gradient(45deg, #f44336, #d32f2f)", # çº¢è‰² "linear-gradient(45deg, #9C27B0, #7B1FA2)", # ç´«è‰² "linear-gradient(45deg, #607D8B, #455A64)" # ç°è“è‰² ] def load_top6_data(): """åŠ è½½æœ€æ–°çš„top6æ’è¡Œæ•°æ®""" top6_file = os.path.join(WEBCLICK_DIR, "latest_top6.json") if not os.path.exists(top6_file): raise FileNotFoundError(f"æœªæ‰¾åˆ°æ’è¡Œæ•°æ®æ–‡ä»¶: {top6_file}") with open(top6_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: data = json.load(f) return data def generate_card_html(item, index): """ç”Ÿæˆå•ä¸ªé¡¹ç›®å¡ç‰‡çš„HTML""" # è§£ææ˜¾ç¤ºåç§° display_name = item['display_name'] parts = display_name.split(' ', 1) if len(parts) == 2: icon = parts[0] name = parts[1] else: icon = "ğŸ”§" name = display_name # è·å–é¡¹ç›®ä¿¡æ¯ short_name = item['short_name'] domain = item['domain'] url = item['url'] visits_7d = item['visits_7d'] # è·å–æè¿°å’Œé¢œè‰² description = PROJECT_DESCRIPTIONS.get(short_name, "ä¸“ä¸šå·¥å…·å¹³å°ï¼Œæä¾›é«˜æ•ˆçš„åœ¨çº¿æœåŠ¡") color = CARD_COLORS[index % len(CARD_COLORS)] # ç”ŸæˆHTML card_html = f'''

''' return card_html def update_homepage(top6_data): """æ›´æ–°ä¸»é¡µHTMLæ–‡ä»¶""" timestamp = datetime.now().strftime('%Y%m%d_%H%M') # æ£€æŸ¥ä¸»é¡µæ–‡ä»¶æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ if not os.path.exists(INDEX_FILE): raise FileNotFoundError(f"æœªæ‰¾åˆ°ä¸»é¡µæ–‡ä»¶: {INDEX_FILE}") # åˆ›å»ºå¤‡ä»½ os.makedirs(BACKUP_DIR, exist_ok=True) backup_file = os.path.join(BACKUP_DIR, f"index_backup_{timestamp}.html") shutil.copy2(INDEX_FILE, backup_file) print(f"å·²åˆ›å»ºå¤‡ä»½: {backup_file}") # è¯»å–å½“å‰ä¸»é¡µå†…å®¹ with open(INDEX_FILE, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: content = f.read() # ç”Ÿæˆæ–°çš„å¡ç‰‡HTML cards_html = [] for i, item in enumerate(top6_data['top6']): card = generate_card_html(item, i) cards_html.append(card) new_cards_section = "\n\n".join(cards_html) # ä½¿ç”¨æ­£åˆ™è¡¨è¾¾å¼æ›¿æ¢é¡¹ç›®å¡ç‰‡éƒ¨åˆ† # åŒ¹é…ä»
åˆ°ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ª
ä¹‹é—´çš„å†…å®¹ pattern = r'(

)' replacement = f'\\1\n{new_cards_section}\n \\3' new_content = re.sub(pattern, replacement, content, flags=re.DOTALL) if new_content == content: print("è­¦å‘Š: æœªæ‰¾åˆ°å¯æ›¿æ¢çš„é¡¹ç›®å¡ç‰‡éƒ¨åˆ†") return False # ä¿å­˜æ›´æ–°åçš„å†…å®¹ with open(INDEX_FILE, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write(new_content) print("ä¸»é¡µHTMLæ›´æ–°æˆåŠŸ!") return True def sync_to_s3(): """åŒæ­¥åˆ°S3å­˜å‚¨æ¡¶ï¼ˆå¦‚æœé…ç½®äº†s3cmdï¼‰""" if shutil.which('s3cmd'): print("åŒæ­¥ä¸»é¡µåˆ°å­˜å‚¨æ¡¶...") os.system(f"s3cmd put {INDEX_FILE} s3://www/index.html --acl-public") print("åŒæ­¥å®Œæˆ") else: print("æœªæ‰¾åˆ°s3cmdï¼Œè·³è¿‡å­˜å‚¨æ¡¶åŒæ­¥") def main(): """ä¸»å‡½æ•°""" print(f"å¼€å§‹æ›´æ–°ä¸»é¡µå¡ç‰‡ - {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}") try: # åŠ è½½æ’è¡Œæ•°æ® data = load_top6_data() print(f"æ•°æ®æ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´: {data['last_update']}") print("Top6æ’è¡Œ:") for item in data['top6']: rank = item['rank'] display_name = item['display_name'] domain = item['domain'] visits_7d = item['visits_7d'] print(f" {rank}. {display_name} - {visits_7d:,} æ¬¡è®¿é—® ({domain})") print() # æ›´æ–°ä¸»é¡µ if update_homepage(data): print("âœ… ä¸»é¡µå¡ç‰‡æ›´æ–°æˆåŠŸï¼") # åŒæ­¥åˆ°å­˜å‚¨æ¡¶ sync_to_s3() else: print("âŒ ä¸»é¡µæ›´æ–°å¤±è´¥") return 1 except Exception as e: print(f"âŒ æ›´æ–°è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å‡ºé”™: {e}") return 1 print(f"æ›´æ–°å®Œæˆ - {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}") print("---") return 0 if __name__ == "__main__": exit(main())

<script>
        let statsVisible = false;
        let autoUpdateInterval = null;
        let hourlyChart = null;
        let dailyChart = null;

        function toggleStats() {
            const panel = document.getElementById('statsPanel');
            statsVisible = !statsVisible;
            
            if (statsVisible) {
                panel.classList.add('active');
                loadStats();
                // å¼€å¯è‡ªåŠ¨æ›´æ–°ï¼Œæ¯60ç§’åˆ·æ–°ä¸€æ¬¡
                autoUpdateInterval = setInterval(loadStats, 60000);
            } else {
                panel.classList.remove('active');
                // å…³é—­è‡ªåŠ¨æ›´æ–°
                if (autoUpdateInterval) {
                    clearInterval(autoUpdateInterval);
                    autoUpdateInterval = null;
                }
            }
        }

        // è·å–æœ€æ–°ç»Ÿè®¡æ•°æ®
        async function fetchLatestStats() {
            try {
                // è·å–æ—¥å¿—ç›®å½•åˆ—è¡¨
                const response = await fetch('/logs/', {
                    method: 'GET',
                    headers: {'Accept': 'application/json'}
                });
                
                if (!response.ok) throw new Error('æ— æ³•è®¿é—®æ—¥å¿—ç›®å½•');
                
                const html = await response.text();
                
                // è§£æHTMLæ‰¾åˆ°æœ€æ–°çš„statsæ–‡ä»¶
                const statsFiles = html.match(/stats_\d{8}_\d{4}\.json/g) || [];
                if (statsFiles.length === 0) throw new Error('æœªæ‰¾åˆ°ç»Ÿè®¡æ–‡ä»¶');
                
                // è·å–æœ€æ–°æ–‡ä»¶
                const latestFile = statsFiles.sort().reverse()[0];
                
                // åŠ è½½ç»Ÿè®¡æ•°æ®
                const statsResponse = await fetch(`/logs/${latestFile}`);
                if (!statsResponse.ok) throw new Error('æ— æ³•åŠ è½½ç»Ÿè®¡æ•°æ®');
                
                const data = await statsResponse.json();
                return data;
                
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('è·å–æ•°æ®å¤±è´¥:', error);
                throw error;
            }
        }

        // æ›´æ–°é¡µé¢æ•°æ®
        function updatePage(data) {
            // æ›´æ–°æ‘˜è¦æ•°æ®
